reviewText: I have waited for several years for the restored digital version of this important film classic. So it was a happy moment when I found this DVD, issued 2014, with newly composed music, with a very interesting booklet and about one hour of extra material. The film has the original chapter headings and to some extent even the original toning. It is a fantastic and historic movie!
I bought this movie because I saw it in the movie MANIAC. It is far too ecclectic for me. eccentric!
